job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Apple Online Store
job.description: Summary Apple Online Store is looking for a highly motivated senior software engineer to join the Apple Online Store Engineering team. You will deliver projects aimed at improving the hugely successful Apple Online Store’s e-commerce experience and features - www.apple.com/shop Key Qualifications The ideal candidate for this role will demonstrate the following characteristics and experience:5 - 10 years Software Engineer/Developer experienceProgramming in Java or other OOO Programming languages with deep understanding of OOO concepts and experience in Spring or other DI frameworksDevelop high-volume performing, multi-threaded, highly scalable, reliable and distributed web services and applicationsDemonstrated expertise in Industry standard encryption methods, systems security and complianceDemonstrated expertise in distributed message based architecture and noSQL data designKnowledge and experience with service-oriented architecture, micro-services and API designExpert knowledge of computer science, with understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software designDemonstrated ability to achieve stretch goals in a highly innovative and fast paced environmentStrong leadership abilities in driving operational excellence and best engineering practicesWe're looking for a hardworking and passionate person to join this amazing team, if you feel this is you, we'd love to hear from you. Description We are looking for a self starting, upbeat individual with excellent written and interpersonal skills, who is a phenomenal teammate, but not afraid to question assumptions and take initiative. As part of the AOS Payments and Order Engineering team, your responsibilities include building high throughput, high performance, highly scalable and reliable web services and applications that powers the Apple Online Store, in SOA design working closely with other applications engineering team and interacting with product, design, content, QA and many other groups to lead and deliver world class e-commerce experience in an exciting fast-paced environment. Education & Experience Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science or Electrical/Electronics Engineering Role Number: 200250913
